topic.title: Acute Hepatitis B Risk Associated Procedure - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1175)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3226 PHVS_BloodorBodyFluidExposureRelatedProcedure_CDC DYNAMIC (CONF:1176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1177)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1175)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3226 PHVS_BloodorBodyFluidExposureRelatedProcedure_CDC DYNAMIC (CONF:1176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1177)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime

p.ph: Acute Hepatitis B Risk Associated Procedure
